attributes.action: EX UK PRIME MINISTERS TO PAY FOR OWN SECURITY
attributes.additional_details:
In these times of austerity any EX UK PRIME MINSTER worth over 1 million pounds should now pay for own security.
This is only fair on UK Tax payers who are paying  £23,000,000+ with free security  in addition to a £70k pension, and £115k allowance.

This petition asks that all EX PRIME MINISTER  be charged the market rate for any security provided.
